about_the_game:
A routine expedition to find a habitable planet doesn't go according to plan, resulting in Captain Fleming's ship being wrecked. In search of shelter from the storm, he finds traces of an intelligent civilization — many abandoned buildings and devices that clearly have a purpose. Where did the creatures that built all this go, and why was the icy planet considered habitable?

Key Features
  • Take on the role of Captain Fleming in a single-player campaign. Find a way to fix the ship and return home.
  • Solve original puzzles by combining four types of energies.
  • Explore the mysterious frozen complex and control alien devices with the energy cubes.
  • Use your flamethrower to burn your way through the ice and enemies. Connect parts of the complex with networks of tunnels, but be cautious; you're not alone here.
  • Embark on an adventure with your loyal, witty AI companion. Find out the reason for the disappearance of civilization and the icing of the entire planet.

name: Arctic 51

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i7-4770 or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600 or Intel Core i7 6700K or newer is recommended
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 2070 Super 8GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Arctic 51 is a unique mix of puzzles, action, and metroidvania in a sci-fi setting. Explore a mysterious complex hidden under the surface of an icy planet, control alien devices by combining different types of energies, and unravel the mystery of the disappearance of an entire civilization.
